body_html:
The errors logged showed certain GPU kernel had problem, but didn't pinpoint which one.

@burglarhobbit, @peterwilliams97 the models above are too complicated for quick trouble shooting. Could you make them minimum examples which only has one input, output and calls the suspicious layer function (tf.layer or tf.keras)?

body:
The errors logged showed certain GPU kernel had problem, but didn't pinpoint which one.

@burglarhobbit, @peterwilliams97  the models above are too complicated for quick trouble shooting. Could you make them **minimum** examples which only has one input, output and calls the suspicious layer function (tf.layer or tf.keras)?
